title: [Epidemiology] Nations that are tight and abide by strict norms have had more success during COVID-19 than those that are looser as of the October, 2020. Nations with high levels of cultural looseness are estimated to have had almost 5 times the number of cases and more than 8 times the number of deaths.
[Health] New Study Suggests Apple Watch Heart Rate Sensor Can Predict COVID-19 Up to a Week Before a Swab Test
